## Current projects in Data Analytics and Data Science

---

### Data Analysis on Twitch viewership between 2019 & 2022

The project involved analyzing a Twitch dataset to explore and gain insights into the data from 2020 to 2022 amidst Covid-19 shutdown.

[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/Python-white?logo=Python)](#) [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/Google-white?logo=Google)](#) [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/pandas-white?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](#) [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/Tableau-white?logo=Tableau)](#)
